Item.label: Cost Vs. Goal
Item.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:msxsl="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt" xmlns:exslt="http://exslt.org/common" extension-element-prefixes="exslt" xmlns:aras="http://www.aras-corp.com"> <xsl:output method="xml" omit-xml-declaration="yes"/> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:variable name="cost_scores"> <xsl:for-each select="//Item[@type='Part']"> <xsl:variable name="cost" select="cost"/> <xsl:variable name="target_value" select="Relationships/Item/target_value"/> <cost_score> <xsl:value-of select="($cost div $target_value)*100"/> </cost_score> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="num_of_items" select="count(//Item[@type='Part'])"/> <Result> <xsl:variable name="result"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="function-available('exslt:node-set')"> <xsl:value-of select="sum(exslt:node-set($cost_scores)/cost_score) div $num_of_items" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="function-available('msxsl:node-set')"> <xsl:value-of select="sum(msxsl:node-set($cost_scores)/cost_score) div $num_of_items" /> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="number($result) or number($result+1)"> <xsl:value-of select="$result"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>100</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Result> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
Item.name: Cost vs. Goal

Item.label: Q4 '04
Item.query: <Item type="Part" action="get" select="id,cost" page="1" pagesize="10000"> <release_date condition="gt">2004-10-01</release_date> <release_date condition="lt">2005-01-01</release_date> <cost condition="is not null"/> <cost_basis condition="ne">Target</cost_basis> <Relationships> <Item type="Part Goal" action="get" select="id,target_value"> <target_value condition="is not null"/> <target_value condition="ne">0</target_value> <goal>Cost</goal> </Item> </Relationships> </Item>

Item.label: Current
Item.query: <Item type="Part" action="get" select="id,cost" page="1" pagesize="10000"> <release_date condition="gt">2006-07-01</release_date> <release_date condition="lt">2006-10-01</release_date> <cost condition="is not null"/> <cost_basis condition="ne">Target</cost_basis> <Relationships> <Item type="Part Goal" action="get" select="id,target_value"> <target_value condition="is not null"/> <target_value condition="ne">0</target_value> <goal>Cost</goal> </Item> </Relationships> </Item>
